doc.title: Shut Eye
doc.plot: Steve is just your ordinary, everyday high school student-with chronic insomnia. As a result of his sleep deprivation, he is caught in a downward spiral, alienated from his classmates and everybody around him. A worried teacher phones the boy's neglectful father who expresses no concern, and then advises Steve to go to a clinic after school for kids with problems. Steve finds it difficult to fit in even with other troubled adolescents, but finds one friend in the form of Jane, a friendly and nonjudgmental girl who sits behind him in English. Steve finally opens up to Jane about his sleep problem, which is somehow related to a mysterious tattoo of an eye on the back of his neck.
